enhanced_description: Orgtomic offers an integrated solution comprising a dynamic Org Chart, People Directory, and Skills Map designed to unlock the potential of distributed talent. It provides actionable insight and discovery across your business, enabling visualization of growth, tracking of remote hiring and diversity targets, and fostering employee discovery and engagement. Users can also create a comprehensive skills and interests matrix across various organizational dimensions to match the right skills to growth opportunities.
